name: BUILD
description: No code AI agent platform to create custom agents. $BUILD agents are autonomous digital companions designed to learn, plan, and make decisions based on your instructions and the environment you set for them. Far from simple bots confined to posting on social media, $BUILD agents can be trained for high-impact tasks—such as real-time arbitrage across chains, managing liquidity pools to maximize yield, or even collaborating in “swarms” to tackle multi-step objectives.
